PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-03322023-04-20PWGSC
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of MELISSA SHARI SONBERG of Montréal, Quebec, to be a director of the Canada Post Corporation Board of Directors, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective April 21, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of MELISSA SHARI SONBERG of Montréal, Quebec, to be a director of the Canada Post Corporation Board of Directors, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective April 21, 2023.
